SourceProxy.name: X3DReader
SourceProxy.label: X3D Reader

Documentation.long_help: Read the geometry of a X3D file.

SourceProxy.Documentation: The X3D reader reads X3D (www.web3d.org) files. The default file extension for XML encoded X3D files is .x3d, for binary encoded file .x3db

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the file name for the X3D reader.
